channel.title: Internet India on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: yea.
item.description: kfc is a bad ideathis statement can now be made for both the U.S. and india. I should have known ;) tonight. suresh and myself are going out on the town, it should be fun. I need to find a nice place to eat. apparently we are going to go to a cool club later. that shoudl be nice. I am not sure what I am going to be doing this weekend.
